column2: ENGLISH
Spirits and Ancestors
Our path forward must be guided by the wisdom of the spirits of the world and the examples set by our righteous ancestors.
Sons of Heaven
The Heavens hold many secrets, and our leaders must be chosen from those wise enough to discover those secrets.
Confucian Principles
While the Confucian faith is not the true faith, adhering to some of its principles will ensure stability and wise leadership.
Spiritual Wisdom
We must understand the wisdom of the spirits of the world to move forward, and we should choose the wisest among us to lead us down the right path.
The Three Mountains
It is the destiny of Ryukyu to rule all of the world, and both men and women must be permitted to help us with our relentless pursuit of this destiny.
Children of the Seas
Our future can be found on the seas of the world, and all men and women should be prepared to sail to seek out this destiny.
People of the Pacific
We must set forth across the seas of the world to find the wisdom of the spirits, no matter where it may be found.
Meritorious Ancestors
Our leaders shall be chosen based on individual merits rather than the order of birth, and they shall lead us according to the wisdom of our ancestors.
Sacrifices for the Ancestors
We must all make the proper sacrifices to ensure that our honored ancestors share their wisdom with us.
Honor for the Spirits
We must all make sacrifices honoring the spirits of the world in order to be blessed with prosperity and safety
Ryukyuan Reformation Doctrines
No Three Mountains
The "The Three Mountains" doctrine, focusing on world conquest, cannot be selected when reforming the Ryukyuan religion.
No AI Three Mountains
The AI is not allowed to select the "The Three Mountains" when reforming the Ryukyuan religion.
Three Mountains allowed
The "The Three Mountains" doctrine is allowed when reforming the Ryukyuan religion, and the AI is very likely to choose it.
Only Three Mountains
The more historical Ryukyuan doctrine is not allowed to be chosen, the "The Three Mountains" doctrine is allowed, and the AI is very likely to choose it.
Chinese Imperial reformations
Disabled
The "Confucian Principles" doctrine cannot be chosen on reformation.
No AI Chinese Imperial reformations
The AI is not allowed to pick the "Confucian Principles" doctrine.
Shenist only
Only Shenist reformers have access to the "Confucian Principles" doctrine.
Shenist only, no AI
Only non-AI Shenist reformers have access to the "Confucian Principles" doctrine.
Enabled
Shenist, Muist, and Thanist reformers are allowed to pick the "Confucian Principles" doctrine, and the AI is very likely to do so.

column2: By constructing this Great Altar, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked, bringing a bit of life to the spirits of our old and fierce gods. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

By constructing this Great Altar, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked, bringing a bit of life to the spirits of our old and fierce gods. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

By carving this Great Bear Totem, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked, bringing a bit of life to the spirits of our old and fierce gods. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

By erecting this Great Stone Tablet, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked, bringing a bit of life to the spirits of our old and fierce gods. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

By erecting this Great Sandung, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked, bringing a bit of life to the spirits of our old and fierce gods. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

By erecting this Great Pillar, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked, bringing a bit of life to the spirits of our old and fierce gods. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].

By erecting this Great Idol, the fires of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith have been stoked, bringing a bit of life to the spirits of our old and fierce gods. The first offerings are already being presented at the feet of the new sacred monument of [From.GetName].
